snippet: Jurgen Klinsmann, the coach of the U.S. men’s national soccer team, and his squad will be in São Paulo for 12 days.
abstract: Jurgen Klinsmann, coach of the United States men's soccer team, announces that all 26 players in his winter camp will travel to Brazil for 12 days of training.
lead_paragraph: Jurgen Klinsmann, the coach of the U.S. men’s national soccer team, and his squad will be in São Paulo for 12 days.

headline.main: U.S. Soccer Coach to Take 26 to Camp in Brazil
headline.print_headline: U.S. Soccer Coach to Take 26 to Camp in Brazil

keywords.value: United States Men's National Soccer Team
